channel.title: Runes required and Summoning skill
channel.description:
ok i have 2 questions.
How to get the requiring runes for magic skills working? i want ppl to need runes to cast spells.
And how to get a delay in the summoning skill? bcause ppl spam like 100 monsters in 10 seconds and that causes pretty much lagg i think :P
Thanx in advance :D
